Package org.wildfly.security.password.interfaces

Interface UnixDESCryptPassword

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.security.Key, OneWayPassword, Password, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RawUnixDESCryptPassword, UnixDESCryptPasswordImpl
    public interface UnixDESCryptPassword
extends OneWayPassword
    The traditional UNIX DES crypt password algorithm.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ALGORITHM_CRYPT_DES
      The algorithm name "crypt-des".

      • Fields inherited from interface java.security.Key

      • impliesParameters

        default boolean impliesParameters​(java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec parameterSpec)
        Description copied from interface: Password
        Determine if this password is matched by the given parameter specification.
        Specified by:
        impliesParameters in interface Password
        Parameters:
        parameterSpec - the parameter specification (must not be null)
        Returns:

      • clone

        UnixDESCryptPassword clone()

        Specified by:

      • createRaw

        static UnixDESCryptPassword createRaw​(java.lang.String algorithm,
                                      short salt,
                                      byte[] hash)
        Create a raw implementation of this password type. No validation of the content is performed, and the password must be "adopted" in to a PasswordFactory (via the PasswordFactory.translate(Password) method) before it can be validated and used to verify guesses.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the algorithm name
        salt - the salt
        hash - the hash
        Returns:
        the raw password implementation
